items.name: restrict_type
items.title: Apply Restrictions On
items.tooltip: This determines restrictions rule to be applied on selected category or all categories of the listing

items.name: restrict_in_category
items.title: Select Marketplace Categories
items.tooltip: Set the restrictions based on the selected marketplace's categories

items.name: total_submisssion
items.title: Total Marketplace items
items.tooltip:
Set the total number of marketplace a user is allowed to create in EasySocial.

When restriction applied on 'specific marketplace categories', the number of marketplace's allowed is applied to each categories.

Note: Set Total items to 1 or greater than 1.

items.name: statusPublished
items.title: Publish Marketplace items When Subscription:
items.tooltip: Determine when should system publish the user's created marketplace that associated with the above selected marketplace's categories based on user's subscription status.

items.name: statusUnpublished
items.title: UnPublish Marketplace items When Subscription:
items.tooltip: Determine when should system unpublish the user's created marketplace that associated with the above selected marketplace's categories based on user's subscription status.
